tool_description: Artificial Intelligence for fake news detection and automated fact checking
name: adverifai
title: adverifai

api_list.name: source_check
api_list.description: Check if a website is purveyor of fake news, satire, political bias, etc. Returns further information about the site or empty if it's not suspect.

api_list.name: /fake_ref
api_list.description: Check if a story or variations are appearing on fake news sites

required_parameters.name: headline
required_parameters.description: Headline of a story to check

api_list.name: /fact_check
api_list.description: Get references to a story from fact checking archives. The references can be used to flag stories that were already debunked by fact checking sites

required_parameters.name: headline
required_parameters.description: Headline of a story to check
